Charmeleon (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0004: Charmander
Pokémon
#0006: Charizard →
For Pokémon TCG Pocket cards, see Charmeleon (TCG Pocket).

Charmeleon has been featured on 25 different cards since it debuted in the Base Set of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Charmeleon cards are normally Fire-type Stage 1 Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Charmeleon

Charmeleon
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
